name: Orbital Blitz
description:
Orbital Blitz is a university group project from 3 programmers and 2 artists made in a 12 week span. For this release however, I am looking for feedback for the 3 different tutorials in the game, you will be given a random one at the start.  So, I need your help to test the game out and gather anonymous data in Unity Analytics for my final year report.

The game currently features an endless generation of crafted levels and a boss fight. You play as a spaceship avoiding obstacles and defeating enemies by shooting and using power ups. The aim is to stay alive as long as possible and pick up green score crystals. I would also appreciate it if you filled out the quick 3 question survey that pops up after 4 runs. 

Thanks and hope you have fun.
